=== About Name ===
I have been using linux programs for more than 12 years. I started with Red Hat desktop and migrated to Debian. I started using Ubuntu when it was first introduced. Today, I primarily use Ubuntu on my personal and business workstations. We also use Ubuntu servers for hosting websites, email hosting, file management and cloud applications.
My company, Swift Staffing, places information technology personnel. 
I am the current lead of the Ubuntu-Maryland Loco.
